snippet: President Nicolas Sarkozy’s party must consider allying itself with the far right or holding to the center and hoping against further losses in June.
abstract: Victory of Francois Hollande in French presidential elections has thrown the country's right into turmoil and opened fresh opportunities for a Socialist triumph in legislative elections in June, with all the potential for a continued redrawing of France's political landscape.
lead_paragraph: President Nicolas Sarkozy’s party must consider allying itself with the far right or holding to the center and hoping against further losses in June.

headline.seo: Sarkozy’s Party, UMP, Assesses 2 Paths After Loss
headline.main: French Center-Right Assesses Two Unpalatable Paths
headline.print_headline: After Sarkozy’s Loss, France’s Center-Right Party Is Facing Unpalatable Options
